articles.title: What AI threat? Most U.S. white-collar workers welcome the technology, survey finds.
articles.content: Most U.S. workers don't consider generative AI to be an immediate threat to their jobs, but they do want to learn how to use the technology, a KPMG survey found.

articles.content: Lionel Messi is “the best player the world has ever seen,” according to former U.S. soccer star Eric Wynalda.
